content.rendered:
Help Us Win Best of the Best!

Gottwals Books has been nominated for Best Book Store in both Macon and Warner Robins! Please vote for us every day until May 1 and help us win the Best of the Best contest.

Vote!

Talk Like Shakespeare Day

Stay tuned to our Facebook page for a chance to win a prize on April 23! We will have some fun word challenges. Give us your best Shakespearean translation for a modern piece of text.

Teacher Appreciation Week

Teacher Appreciation Week will be quite eventful at Gottwals Books. We will have special events, loads of giveaways, and all kinds of perks for our teachers. We are thankful for their service and dedication, so we intend to show it! Look for more announcements in the coming days.

New Titles Every Day

Sci-fi, fiction, teen, young adult, non-fiction… We process new titles every day. There is always something new to discover!

excerpt.rendered: Gottwals Books has been nominated for Best Book Store in both Macon and Warner Robins! Please vote for us every day until May 1 and help us win the Best of the Best contest.
